title: Policy and regulations of Active Shooter in CARON CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any active shooter/active assailant insurance policies from 2021 - 2023
2. Any student safety policies related to an active shooter/active assailant 2021 - 2023
3. Public comment related to active shooter/active assailant concerns from 2021 - 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Shaira roscom

title: Active Shooter Policies (Clark County School District)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

title: Sexual Education Curriculum ( Washoe County School District)

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Sexual Education Curriculum ( Washoe County School District)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the standard curriculum currently used for sexual education throughout the school district. If there is different standard curricula for different grade levels, I would like all of those individual curricula.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tristen Taylor Werner

title: Flo-Rida and University of Nevada Reno Agreements

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Flo-Rida and University of Nevada Reno Agreements
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any agreements between The University of Nevada, Reno and Tramar Lacel Dillard(Flo Rida) regarding his performance on September 2, 2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alex Macdonald

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: DUI Data in Washoe County 2022-2023
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All DUI arrest data for JAN 2022-MAR 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Shaira roscom
